summary: Os Crimes de Grindelwald tem pior bilheteria mundial entre os filmes do Mundo Bruxo
title: Os Crimes de Grindelwald tem pior bilheteria mundial entre os filmes do Mundo Bruxo
description:
Animais Fantásticos: Os Crimes de Grindelwald encerra sua exibição nos cinemas com a pior bilheteria mundial entre os dez filmes do Mundo Bruxo de J.K. Rowling, com uma arrecadação mundial total de 644,6 milhões de dólares. No Brasil o filme arrecadou um total de 15,7 milhões de dólares ficando em 5o lugar entre os filmes do Mundo Bruxo.

Bilheteria mundial (em ordem crescente de arrecadação)
Animais Fantásticos: Os Crimes de Grindelwald: 644,6 milhões de dólares
Harry Potter e o Prisioneiro de Azkaban: 796,9 milhões de dólares
Animais Fantásticos e Onde Habitam: 814 milhões de dólares
Harry Potter e a Câmara Secreta: 879,2 milhões de dólares
Harry Potter e o Cálice de Fogo: 897 milhões de dólares
Harry Potter e o Enigma do Príncipe: 934,5 milhões de dólares
Harry Potter e a Ordem da Fênix: 940 milhões de dólares
Harry Potter e as Relíquias da Morte – Parte 1: 960,4 milhões de dólares
Harry Potter e a Pedra Filosofal: 975 milhões de dólares
Harry Potter e as Relíquias da Morte – Parte 2: $1,3 bilhões de dólares

Bilheteria brasileira (em ordem crescente de arrecadação)
Harry Potter e a Câmara Secreta: 6 milhões de dólares
Harry Potter e o Prisioneiro de Azkaban: 6,9 milhões de dólares
Harry Potter e a Pedra Filosofal: 9,7 milhões de dólares
Harry Potter e o Cálice de Fogo: 13,7 milhões de dólares
Animais Fantásticos: Os Crimes de Grindelwald: 15,7 milhões de dólares
Harry Potter e a Ordem da Fênix: 17,5 milhões de dólares
Animais Fantásticos e Onde Habitam: 19,5 milhões de dólares
Harry Potter e o Enigma do Príncipe: 20,2 milhões de dólares
Harry Potter e as Relíquias da Morte – Parte 1: 23,9 milhões de dólares
Harry Potter e as Relíquias da Morte – Parte 2: 35,7 milhões de dólares

summary: some person: hey professor mcgonagall i just wanted to discuss the new student list for this year. mcgonagall: very well then....
body:
some person: hey professor mcgonagall i just wanted to discuss the new student list for this year.

mcgonagall: very well then.

some person: they’re all very sweet i’m sure, but there’s one student that i think we need to be worried about.

mcgonagall: don’t worry, i’ve dealt with some shockers in my time. i’m sure this isn’t something we can’t deal with.

some person: uh…well…you see, this student’s name is james sirius potter.

mcgonagall:

mcgonagall:

mcgonagall:

mcgonagall: fuck

title: The Little Details
body:
by AnotherAspiringAuthor

The story stays the same; Ginny Weasley goes down into the Chamber, compelled by the diary of a lonely, bitter boy. Harry Potter follows, slays the monster and saves the day. But it’s the little details that are changed forever when she turns up to the Quidditch match against Slytherin with Ron and Hermione. Point A and Point B remain the same; it’s the journey between them that’s different. A retelling of CoS.

Words: 3664, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/M, Gen
  • Characters: Harry Potter, Ron Weasley, Hermione Granger, Ginny Weasley, Colin Creevey, Gilderoy Lockhart, Draco Malfoy, Diary Tom Riddle
  • Relationships: Harry Potter/Ginny Weasley
  • Additional Tags: Fluff, Chamber of Secrets, CoS Rewrite, Angst, Drama, AU, Alternate Universe, Romance, Slow Burn, Big Brother Ron, The Trio become Four

Read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2D9c2lq

summary:
Gryffindor: hey, slow down. What's the hurry?
Ravenclaw: I have to get to potions.  I can't be late!!!
Gryffindor: why, what...
body:
Gryffindor: hey, slow down. What’s the hurry?

Ravenclaw: I have to get to potions. I can’t be late!!!

Gryffindor: why, what happened?

Ravenclaw: well yesterday, I was late and everyone just…. Looked at me.

summary:
Opened in 1850 by Delilah Evergreen the Evergreen University has been
 helping students with their higher education for years....
caption:
Opened in 1850 by Delilah Evergreen the Evergreen University has been helping students with their higher education for years. Offering a variety of programs including business, muggle studies, and healing, this is the perfect place to expand your worldview and get all the skills you need in your future profession.

The date is August 21st 2025. Unlike Hogwarts, Evergreen University is hidden in several buildings around London. Headmistress Zelda Marigold wants to modernize the school and encourages students to use technology. Professors from all backgrounds are welcome at the school, as Miss. Marigold looks for the most qualified of teachers.

Are you interested in continuing your education? Do you want a lowkey, fun RP group that mixes canon and OCs? This is the place for you! Feel free to send an ask in or an app. We’re always happy to answer your questions!

                                        Home || Apply || Characters || Rules

summary: au post potter america 2029 MACUSA has fallen and the American Wizarding Community is at the cusp of anarchy. The New Salem...
caption:
au post potter america 2029
MACUSA has fallen and the American Wizarding Community is at the cusp of anarchy.
The New Salem Philanthropic Society has returned with more influence and power than anyone could have imagined.
the witch hunts have begun.

index ◇ member groups ◇ claims ◇ wanted ads ◇ discord

reblog.comment:
au post potter america 2029

summary: u have the final say as to which house you belong to. it's ultimately your choice
question: u have the final say as to which house you belong to. it's ultimately your choice
answer: I know most people would be stoked about Gryffindor, and although I think my adventurous side is probably why it sorted me there from my answering of certain questions, I feel like I’m a Hufflepuff through and through.

summary: It had been weeks since anyone had heard from a particular bushy haired woman. Hermione Granger, yes she had officially dropped...
body:
It had been weeks since anyone had heard from a particular bushy haired woman. Hermione Granger, yes she had officially dropped the Weasley from her named, as she looked at her son’s empty room. She had placed a petrification charm on the room, so that it would remind untouched for as long as she could keep it. This meant those that she couldn’t physically touch anything in the room though. She remembered the day she performed a similar spell on the nursery in Harry’s home months after that event happened.

Hermione didn’t know how to handle such pain; the lost of a child. She even debated about keeping Rose here but she knew Hogwarts was…

…she couldn’t finish that thought with a good mind anymore. As an adult she was able to reflect some of the nonsense that was even allowed at that school. Even casting spells seemed dangerous. As a child, Magic was beautiful and mystifying, something only one can experience with openness and clarity. When she performed magic, it had felt like a piece of herself that she had no idea existed was finally whole.

Now, Hermione questioned all that she knew. Magic. Her government. Her world. Her values. Her heart. After finalizing the divorce from Ron, she thought…something would happen. No. She only felt empty, though she had been feeling this way since Hugo’s death.

Hermione’s lip quivered. Her son…

She walked around the room and stared at the bed. She always told him to make his bed when he got up in the mornings and he never listened. Hermione cried as she saw that the bed was made. The one time he listened to her and then…he must have been feverish when he made it. She remembered the day she found him in the hallway, just outside the bedroom door, feverish and covered in horrible green and purple spots.

How did she not have known?! How could she be a horrible mother?! What mother puts her career before her child?!

She heard it all. She was public enemy number one. She was her own worst enemy right now.

Hermione stepped out of the room and turned off the lights, closing the door. She breathed heavily for a moment, knowing that despite her pain and loss, she had to move forward. Rose still needed…or did she?

Hermione had more support then she ever knew, but who supported Hugo? If she could find a time turner, she would use it to kick her own butt and tell her past self to focus on her children more.

But time turners were all destroyed. She knew that because she had destroyed them all with Harry’s help. It was just as they went into their office roles and Hermione had made them illegal…and she personally destroyed all of them. She remembered the day Harry had come to her in tears, begging her if she had kept even one of them, just one, so that he could go back and stop his child from being taken away. Hermione had been cold, and said no. That was the truth. She had destroyed them.

Now Hermione wished she could go back and stop herself.

Too many mistakes. So much consequences. Not even time to fix those consequences…

Hermione snapped out of her thoughts as she put her wand away and pulled out her cellphone, and answered it. “Hello?…Oh, hi Mum…yeah, I made the arrangements. I’ll be visiting you and dad very soon….I was planning on staying a while…I hope you don’t mind…but I need a little break from everything.”
